channel.title: Auto Restarter v2 + DOWNLOAD LINK
channel.description:
[center][b][size=24pt]If you like/download this please comment![/size][/b][/center]
[center]Well seeing how everyone has the voule Auto Restarter I wanted to make my own unique restarter and seeing how voule is from rs-server.net !!NON EXISTING WEBSITE!!. So Ive desided to make a Auto Restarter from Moparscape.org. [/center]
[center][b]v2 Features:[/b][/center] This features a friendly interface and a cleaner one then Voule auto restarter and also better times, but uses the same method of auto restarting sadly, I am lazy and wanted v1 to be like voules. And also has a new loading and saving method, with a custom time and I added a hotkey, "H" press it and a help menu will pop up.
[center][b]v2 Picture:[/b][/center] [center][IMG]http://img213.imageshack.us/img213/9048/autorestarterv2.png[/img][/center]
[center][b]v1 Features:[/b][/center] This features a friendly interface and a cleaner one then Voule auto restarter and also better times, but uses the same method of auto restarting sadly, I am lazy and wanted v1 to be like voules.
[center][b]v1 Picture:[/b][/center] [center][IMG]http://img130.imageshack.us/img130/5556/restarterpic1.png[/img][/center]
[center]Code for auto restarter both v1 and v2[/center] [code]@echo off cls tskill java /a cls title Auto Restarter java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server [/code]
Save the file as auto restarter.bat . . . And place both files in your server folder.
[size=18pt]Make sure you save the bat, or rename it to "auto restarter.bat"!!!!!! GOD IT SAYS IT ABOVE. If you can't even do this right... please download the Package.[/size]
[b]Ok, if you're using vista, make sure you right click it and click Run as Administrator. This might help.[/b]
[b]Also, if you're using a PI source replace this line in the auto restarter.bat that looks like this:[/b][code]java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server[/code] replace that with your orginal run.bat run code, which usually looks like this: [code]java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server[/code] [b]DO NOT USE THIS RUN, THIS IS ONLY FOR REFERENCE![/b]
Download link: [url=http://uppit.com/ig49c1lu9kj4/Auto_Restarter.exe]Download v1[/url]
Download link: [url=http://uppit.com/byggdfr3xe0k/Auto_Restarter_v2.exe]Download v2[/url] New link, fixed a few typos.
Download link: [url=http://uppit.com/8g80pzvebnef/Auto_Restarter_Package.rar]Auto Restarter Package[/url] Download if you're clueless.
Milliseconds Converter: [url=http://www.calculateme.com/Time/Minutes/ToMilliseconds.htm]Here[/url]
AhnLab-V3 2010.08.01.00 2010.07.31 - AntiVir 8.2.4.32 2010.07.30 - Antiy-AVL 2.0.3.7 2010.07.30 - Authentium 5.2.0.5 2010.07.31 - Avast 4.8.1351.0 2010.08.01 - Avast5 5.0.332.0 2010.08.01 - AVG 9.0.0.851 2010.08.01 - BitDefender 7.2 2010.08.01 - CAT-QuickHeal 11.00 2010.07.31 - ClamAV 0.96.0.3-git 2010.08.01 - Comodo 5608 2010.08.01 - DrWeb 5.0.2.03300 2010.08.01 - Emsisoft 5.0.0.34 2010.07.30 - eSafe 7.0.17.0 2010.08.01 - eTrust-Vet 36.1.7753 2010.07.31 - F-Prot 4.6.1.107 2010.07.31 - F-Secure 9.0.15370.0 2010.08.01 - Fortinet 4.1.143.0 2010.08.01 - GData 21 2010.08.01 - Ikarus T3.1.1.84.0 2010.08.01 - Jiangmin 13.0.900 2010.08.01 - Kaspersky 7.0.0.125 2010.08.01 - McAfee 5.400.0.1158 2010.08.01 - McAfee-GW-Edition 2010.1 2010.07.30 - Microsoft 1.6004 2010.08.01 - NOD32 5331 2010.08.01 - Norman 6.05.11 2010.08.01 - nProtect 2010-08-01.01 2010.08.01 - Panda 10.0.2.7 2010.08.01 - PCTools 7.0.3.5 2010.08.01 - Prevx 3.0 2010.08.01 - Rising 22.58.05.04 2010.07.31 - Sophos 4.56.0 2010.08.01 - Sunbelt 6671 2010.08.01 - SUPERAntiSpyware 4.40.0.1006 2010.08.01 - Symantec 20101.1.1.7 2010.08.01 - TheHacker 6.5.2.1.328 2010.07.30 - TrendMicro 9.120.0.1004 2010.08.01 - TrendMicro-HouseCall 9.120.0.1004 2010.08.01 - VBA32 3.12.12.7 2010.07.30 - ViRobot 2010.7.31.3965 2010.08.01 - VirusBuster 5.0.27.0 2010.08.01 -

item.title: Auto Restarter v2 + DOWNLOAD LINK
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“trublue, post:34, topic:353636”][quote author=Mod Val link=topic=449949.msg3348526#msg3348526 date=1285029785]

Hey…umm im new at using an Auto Restarter…and i have a few questions…(please no flame im new to using these things…)
Ok, first off…nice btw, and second…i click on the Auto Restarter and it runs…it brings up my run.bat thingy that runs my source…accept title says Auto Restarter…so i close outta my run.bat for my source…and using the auto restarter…and i was testing it…and made it every 15 seconds to see if it really works…and all it does is bring up another Auto Restarter for the Run.bat to run the server…but doesnt exit outta the previous one…so its not technically restarting my server…what can problem be?..
Please message me at Rebornprodigy@Hotmail.com
Thankz much appreciated.

Ok, make sure know what source you’re using, and make sure you’re using the code that I have provided. If you still have trouble post your server files not your coding, but server files so I can see what you’re running.

Val
[/quote]

Im using Exion’s PI, if that helps any, and i tryed every possible way, thats why i kinda ask for someone to PM me on my Email Rebornprodigy@Hotmail.com, or Team View me and do it themselfs, because i HAVE NEVER used an auto restarter, but i feel it wud help me during the night when i sleep.[/quote]horrible, Sanity’s PI you mean

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Caused by:java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server at java.net.UrlClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doprivileged(Native Method) at java.net.UrlClassLoader.findclass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launsher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(unknown source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: server. Program will exit.

What should i do?[/quote]
